Files

image extends file
in package
  • Application

image.php : 7

The image class extends the file class to handle image-specific functionality, such as creating and managing image thumbnails.

Table of Contents

Count()

2_file.php : 258

Counts the total number of files a user owns.

public Count(int $userID[, string $FileType = "image" ]) : int
Parameters
$userID : int

The user ID.

$FileType : string = "image"

The type of file to count.

Return values
int —

The number of files.

CreateImageThumbNail()

image.php : 27

Creates a thumbnail for the image.

public CreateImageThumbNail() : string

This function resizes the original image to a minimum width of 512 pixels, maintaining the aspect ratio, and returns the thumbnail as a JPEG image string.

Return values
string —

The JPEG image string of the thumbnail.

delete()

2_file.php : 93

Deletes the file, either permanently or softly.

public delete([bool $softDelete = false ]) : mixed
Parameters
$softDelete : bool = false

If true, the file is only marked as deleted rather than being permanently removed.

Find()

2_file.php : 213

Finds files based on the owner, type, order, and limit.

public Find([int|null $userID = null ][, string|null $fileType = null ][, string $fileSort = "`id` DESC" ][, int $limit = 1 ]) : array<string|int, mixed>
Parameters
$userID : int|null = null

The owner of the file or NULL for all users.

$fileType : string|null = null

The type of file to find.

$fileSort : string = "`id` DESC"

The order to return the files in.

$limit : int = 1

The number of files to return.

Return values
array<string|int, mixed> —

An array of file objects.

get()

image.php : 100

Retrieves the image data and its thumbnail from the database.

public get(int $id) : bool

This function retrieves the image data by calling the parent get() method, and then retrieves the thumbnail associated with the image.

Parameters
$id : int

The ID of the image.

Return values
bool —

Returns true if the image and thumbnail are successfully retrieved, false otherwise.

Retrieves file metadata from the database using a unique ID.

public getFileMetadata(string $id) : bool
Parameters
$id : string

The unique ID of the file (hash and ID combined).

Return values
bool —

True if metadata is retrieved successfully, false otherwise.

set()

image.php : 76

Sets the image data in the database, including the thumbnail.

public set() : mixed

This function inserts the image data into the database by calling the parent set() method, and then generates and stores the thumbnail.

update()

image.php : 131

Updates the image data in the database, including the thumbnail.

public update() : mixed

This function updates the image data by calling the parent update() method, and then generates and stores the new thumbnail.
